1236660.name: OMSI 2 Add-on Downloadpack Vol. 9 – KI-Luxusautos
1236660.description:
They are the eye-catchers in real road traffic: luxury cars. Now these noble cars are also available in the bus simulator OMSI 2.

Probably the makers of the popular car TV show "The Grand Tour" would make big eyes when choosing them, because many of the dream cars have already been presented and tested in the show.

Some luxury is now also allowed in OMSI 2, because with the Downloadpack Vol. 9 "Luxury Cars" extraordinary cars come into the AI traffic. They give the AI traffic even more charm, authenticity and that certain something.

All models are optimized in terms of polygon count to perform as well as possible and they have their own, sometimes rich sounds. As always, the vehicles are available in different colors.

For an extravagant choice in AI traffic this package provides:
  • Aston Martin DB11
  • Audi S7 Sportback
  • Lamborghini Aventador
  • Lamborghini Urus
  • MB CLS
  • MB G-Klasse
  • MB GLC Coupe
  • MB S-Klasse
  • MB S Coupe
  • Porsche 911
  • Porsche Macan
  • Porsche Panamera
  • Range Rover Evoque
  • Tesla Model 3

The AI vehicles must be manually integrated into the existing OMSI maps in order to use them. There is no automatic integration!

Features:
  • Over 14 different AI vehicles
  • Vehicle types of known car manufacturers
  • Vehicles in different repaints / colors
  • For use on existing maps
  • Performance optimized 3D models
  • Vehicles with individual sound
1236660.supported_languages:
英语*, 德语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
